milestones.description: This is the highest match aggregate (395) involving teams Pakistan & Bangladesh in ODIs
Gazi Ashraf has broken the record for playing the most ODIs (4) for BAN, going past Gholam Nousher
Gholam Nousher has conceded the most runs in an innings (55) in ODIs for BAN, going past Gholam Nousher's record of 45
Ijaz Ahmed and Moin-ul-Atiq's 205-run partnership is PAK's highest for the 3rd wicket in ODIs, breaking the record of 158 between Zaheer Abbas and Javed Miandad
Azhar Hossain and Faruque Ahmed's 30-run partnership is BAN's highest for the 1st wicket in ODIs, breaking the record of 26 between Raqibul Hasan and Nurul Abedin
Gazi Ashraf and Faruque Ahmed's 9-run partnership is BAN's highest for the 2nd wicket in ODIs, breaking the record of 3 between Nurul Abedin and Gazi Ashraf
Jahangir Shah and Akram Khan's 29-run partnership is BAN's highest for the 7th wicket in ODIs, breaking the record of 9 between Jahangir Shah and Golam Faruq
Ijaz Ahmed's 124 is the highest individual score in ODIs (for PAK), surpassing Zaheer Abbas's 123

series.name: Wills Asia Cup

recentMatches.title: 6th Match
recentMatches.statusText: Sri Lanka won by 9 wickets (with 85 balls remaining)

image.caption: Black clouds hang over the Bangabandhu national stadium in Dhaka
image.longCaption: Black clouds hang over Banghabandhu nation stadium in Dhaka as the pitch is covered with plastic 20 April 2003. South African and India are to play the final match of the TVS tri-nation cricket tournament, but heavy rain stopped the match before it could start
